sentences.en: Adjust the aerial's position and direction for the best reception.
sentences.cn: 调整天线的位置和方向以达到最佳接收效果。

sentences.en: Aerial bombing of rebel positions is continuing.
sentences.cn: 对叛军阵地的空中轰炸正在继续。

sentences.en: aerial photographs
sentences.cn: 在空中拍摄的照片

sentences.en: an aerial attack
sentences.cn: 空袭

sentences.en: An aerial photograph of the field shows clearly where the buildings were.
sentences.cn: 这一场地的空中照片清晰地显示出这些建筑物的位置.

sentences.en: an aerial socket on the television
sentences.cn: 电视机上的天线插孔

sentences.en: An aerial thrust up from the grass verge.
sentences.cn: 一根天线在草地边上竖立着。

sentences.en: an aerial view of the Three Gorges Dam project
sentences.cn: 一张三峡大坝工程鸟瞰图

sentences.en: For this we developed two new devices , rockets and aerial mines.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们便发明了两种新武器――火箭和空中布雷.

sentences.en: He climbed up to the roof to adjust the aerial for a better reception.
sentences.cn: 他爬上屋顶调整天线,以改善接收效果.

sentences.en: Is there any aerial liner between Paris and Hong Kong?
sentences.cn: 法国和香港之间有定期航班 吗 ?

sentences.en: On the receiving instrument he also used an elevated aerial and earth.
sentences.cn: 在接收装置上,他也采用了高架天线和接地装置.

sentences.en: Patterns that are invisible on the ground can be the most striking part of an aerial photograph.
sentences.cn: 地面上看不出来的图案可能会成为航拍照片中最引人注目的东西。

sentences.en: The banyan tree has aerial roots.
sentences.cn: 榕树有气根。

sentences.en: The birds perched upon the television aerial.
sentences.cn: 那些鸟栖在电视天线上.

sentences.en: The film begins with an aerial view of the Great Basin of Nevada.
sentences.cn: 影片以空中鸟瞰内华达大盆地的镜头开始。

sentences.en: The seagulls swirled in aerial combat over the barges.
sentences.cn: 海鸥盘旋在驳船上方，展开空中的搏斗。

sentences.en: Weeks of aerial bombardment had destroyed factories and highways.
sentences.cn: 数周的空中轰炸已经摧毁了许多工厂和公路。

sentences.en: Weeks of aerial bombardment had destroyed factories and motorways.
sentences.cn: 数周的空袭已经摧毁了各工厂和公路。

sentences.en: You'll need a good aerial to exploit the radio's performance.
sentences.cn: 你需要弄个好天线来发挥广播的性能。

words.tran_cn: 空想地；在空中；象空气一样
高空杂技演员；空中飞贼
高巢；高处的城堡；高处的房子（等于aerie）
非物质的,理想的,难以提携的

phrases.tran_cn: 航空用照相机；航空摄影机
航空摄影测量；航拍测量法
n. 空中摄影；空中照相术
高架索道；架空索道；架空死
航空测量，空中测量；航空摄影测量；航空调查

trans.tran_cn: 空中的，空气中的，地表以上的，从飞机上的
trans.tran_en: in or moving through the air
a piece of equipment for receiving or sending radio or television signals, usually consisting of a piece of metal or wire
